remarks: Lemma for ~ bj-vtoclg1f1 (an instance of this lemma is a version of ~ bj-vtoclg1f1 where ` x ` and ` y ` are identified).  (Contributed by BJ, 30-Apr-2019.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-exlimmpi.nf $e |- F/ x ps $.
bj-exlimmpi.maj $e |- ( ch -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
bj-exlimmpi.min $e |- ph $.
bj-exlimmpi $p |- ( E. x ch -> ps ) $.
